questions.text: Which age group makes you light up the most?

feedback.title: Wonderful choice, {name}!
feedback.message: Early childhood education is incredibly rewarding! 85% of early childhood graduates report high job satisfaction, working with children from birth to 12 years.

feedback.title: Great thinking, {name}!
feedback.message: 70% of students pursuing Bachelor of Teaching in Primary Education enrol as double degree students for broader career opportunities!

feedback.title: Excellent pick, {name}!
feedback.message: Teaching across both primary and secondary levels opens up amazing career flexibility! You'll be qualified to teach students aged 5-18.

feedback.title: Smart choice, {name}!
feedback.message: Secondary teaching is in high demand! 90% of secondary education graduates find employment within 6 months of graduating.

questions.text: Do you want to keep it simple, or mix it up?
questions.subtitle: Double degrees take 4 years too — same time, extra options.

feedback.title: Brilliant decision, {name}!
feedback.message: Double degree students often find more diverse career opportunities! Same 4 years, double the expertise and career options.

feedback.title: Perfect focus, {name}!
feedback.message: Focused primary education degrees provide deep specialisation! You'll be teaching across all key learning areas from Foundation to Year 6.

options.label: 💪 Yep, Health & PE is my jam

questions.text: How important is inclusion to you?

options.label: 💖 Super important — make it my focus

feedback.title: Amazing choice, {name}!
feedback.message: Inclusive education specialists are desperately needed! You'll be making a real difference supporting diverse learners and championing inclusion.

feedback.title: Great approach, {name}!
feedback.message: General primary and secondary education offers incredible variety! You'll teach across different year levels and can specialise later.

feedback.title: Creative choice, {name}!
feedback.message: Arts, languages and media teachers inspire creativity! You'll choose two teaching areas from languages, humanities, media, psychology and more.

feedback.title: Smart thinking, {name}!
feedback.message: Business and economics teachers are highly valued! You'll be preparing students for real-world financial literacy and career success.

feedback.title: Harmonious choice, {name}!
feedback.message: Music education combines passion with pedagogy! You'll be inspiring the next generation of musicians and music lovers.

feedback.title: Brilliant selection, {name}!
feedback.message: STEM teachers are in huge demand! Choose from maths, biology, chemistry, physics, psychology or digital technologies.

feedback.title: Artistic vision, {name}!
feedback.message: Visual arts teachers nurture creativity! This double degree format gives you both artistic expertise and teaching skills.

feedback.title: Active choice, {name}!
feedback.message: Secondary HPE specialists are essential! You can even add a third teaching area like business or maths for extra versatility.

outcomes.blurb: Wellbeing, coaching and movement — teach HPE across year levels.

outcomes.title: Primary & Secondary Inclusive & Special Education
outcomes.blurb: Champion inclusion and support diverse learners across ages 5–18.

outcomes.title: Primary & Secondary Education
outcomes.blurb: Teach across stages of development and specialise at secondary.
